org.springframework.data.web.config

类 ProjectingArgumentResolverRegistrar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.web.config.ProjectingArgumentResolverRegistrar

  • @Configuration
public class ProjectingArgumentResolverRegistrar
extends Object
    Configuration class to register a BeanPostProcessor to augment RequestMappingHandlerAdapter with a ProxyingHandlerMethodArgumentResolver.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ProjectingArgumentResolverRegistrar() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static org.springframework.data.web.config.ProjectingArgumentResolverRegistrar.ProjectingArgumentResolverBeanPostProcessor projectingArgumentResolverBeanPostProcessor(org.springframework.beans.factory.ObjectFactory<org.springframework.core.convert.ConversionService> conversionService)
      Registers a BeanPostProcessor to modify RequestMappingHandlerAdapter beans in the application context to get a ProxyingHandlerMethodArgumentResolver configured as first HandlerMethodArgumentResolver.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    • 方法详细资料

      • projectingArgumentResolverBeanPostProcessor

        @Bean
public static org.springframework.data.web.config.ProjectingArgumentResolverRegistrar.ProjectingArgumentResolverBeanPostProcessor projectingArgumentResolverBeanPostProcessor(@Qualifier(value="mvcConversionService")
                                                                                                                                                                                    org.springframework.beans.factory.ObjectFactory<org.springframework.core.convert.ConversionService> conversionService)
        Registers a BeanPostProcessor to modify RequestMappingHandlerAdapter beans in the application context to get a ProxyingHandlerMethodArgumentResolver configured as first HandlerMethodArgumentResolver.
        参数:
        conversionService - the Spring MVC ConversionService in a lazy fashion, so that its initialization is not triggered yet.
        返回:
